biocontainers.name: focus
biocontainers.summary: FOCUS is an innovative and agile model to profile and report organisms present in metagenomic samples based on composition usage without sequence length dependencies.

biotools.summary: FOCUS (Find Organisms by Composition Usage) is an agile profiler for metagenomic data.

bioschemas.name: FOCUS
bioschemas.summary: FOCUS (Find Organisms by Composition Usage) is an agile profiler for metagenomic data.
